com.pb.sawdust.tabledata.transform.row

Class ContextualRowWiseTransformation<C>

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.pb.sawdust.tabledata.transform.row.RowWiseDataTableTransformation
      • com.pb.sawdust.tabledata.transform.row.ContextualRowWiseTransformation<C>
  • Type Parameters:
    C - The type of the context.
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    DataTableTransformation, MutatingDataTableTransformation
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    ContextualRowWiseColumnTransformation

    public abstract class ContextualRowWiseTransformation<C>
extends RowWiseDataTableTransformation
    The ContextualRowWiseTransformation class is a row-wise data table transformation which provides structured access to some extra "contextual" information when performing transformations. Access to the context is provided through ContextDataRow instances provided in the transformation methods.

    • Constructor Detail

    • Method Detail

      • transformRow

        protected abstract void transformRow(ContextDataRow<C> row,
                DataTable table,
                int rowIndex)
        Transform a given row of data in the table. The actual transformation should be performed on the table (at the specified row index), and not on the data row, which may be unmodifiable or separated view of the data. On the other hand, access of the row's data (and context) for use in the transformation should occur through the data row parameter.
        Parameters:
        row - The ContextDataRow representation of the row to transform. This object will hold the context which may be used in the transformation.
        table - The table holding the row to transform.
        rowIndex - The index (in table of the row to transform.

      • getContextDataRow

        protected abstract ContextDataRow<C> getContextDataRow(DataRow row,
                                  DataTable table,
                                  int rowIndex)
        Get the ContextDataRow for the specified row.
        Parameters:
        row - The row which will form the basis of the context data row.
        table - The table that row came from.
        rowIndex - The index of row in table.
        Returns:
        the context data row holding both the context and row's information.
